stratagems.target: One PENITENT unit from your army that was selected as the target as one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Roll one D6: your unit can be moved a distance in inches up to the result, but it must end that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit (excluding AIRCRAFT). When doing so, models in your unit can be moved within Engagement Range of enemy units.

stratagems.name: BOUNDLESS ZEAL
stratagems.type: Penitent Host – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: The urge to absolve their sins and destroy the enemy drives the penitents to push their tortured bodies beyond their mortal limits.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase, just after an ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army Falls Back.TARGET: That ADEPTA SORORITAS unit.EFFECT: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot or declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back. If your unit has the PENITENT keyword, it is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back instead.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase, just after an ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army Falls Back.
stratagems.target: That ADEPTA SORORITAS unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot or declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back. If your unit has the PENITENT keyword, it is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back instead.

stratagems.name: CONTEMPT FOR DEATH
stratagems.type: Penitents and Pilgrims – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: The desire for absolution lends the penitent hosts unnatural resilience in the face of superior foes.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: SLICK WITH GORE
stratagems.type: Penitents and Pilgrims – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: With chainsword and fist these warriors cut through the enemy until their bodies are coated in viscera and the foe quail before their bloody advance.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase, just after an ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army destroys an enemy unit.TARGET: That ADEPTA SORORITAS unit.EFFECT: Until the end of the battle, your unit is slick with gore. In the Battle-shock step of your opponent's Command phase, if an enemy unit that is below its Starting Strength is within 6" of and visible to a unit from your army that is slick with gore, that enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test. If that enemy unit is also Below Half-strength, subtract 1 from that test. This cannot cause a unit to take two Battle-shock tests in the same phase.RESTRICTIONS: You cannot use this Stratagem while a unit from your army that is slick with gore is on the battlefield.
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army destroys an enemy unit.
stratagems.target: That ADEPTA SORORITAS unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the battle, your unit is slick with gore. In the Battle-shock step of your opponent's Command phase, if an enemy unit that is below its Starting Strength is within 6" of and visible to a unit from your army that is slick with gore, that enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test. If that enemy unit is also Below Half-strength, subtract 1 from that test. This cannot cause a unit to take two Battle-shock tests in the same phase.RESTRICTIONS: You cannot use this Stratagem while a unit from your army that is slick with gore is on the battlefield.

stratagems.name: FEVERED ZEALOTS
stratagems.type: Penitents and Pilgrims – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Driven on by the depths of their own zeal, these warriors pile through hatchways and bulkheads, desperate to slaughter the blasphemers.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Movement phase, just after an ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army opens a Hatchway.TARGET: That ADEPTA SORORITAS unit.EFFECT: Until the end of the turn, your unit has the Fights First ability.
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase, just after an ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army opens a Hatchway.
stratagems.target: That ADEPTA SORORITAS unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit has the Fights First ability.

stratagems.name: SAVAGE FRENZY
stratagems.type: Penitents and Pilgrims – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: A tide of screaming zealots swarms over the enemy, flailing wildly with deadly weapons and slaughtering any who attempt to flee.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit is selected to Fall Back.TARGET: One ARCO-FLAGELLANTS or REPENTIA SQUAD unit from your army within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, when that enemy unit Falls Back, models in it must take Desperate Escape tests as if their unit was Battle-shocked. When doing so, if that enemy unit is also Battle-shocked by other means, subtract 1 from each of those Desperate Escape tests.

stratagems.name: FINAL TESTAMENT
stratagems.type: Pious Protectors – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: The Sisters of Battle expect to die in battle. They strive to take as many blasphemers as possible with them to the grave.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.TARGET: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.EFFECT: You can discard 1 Miracle dice. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if you discarded a Miracle dice: on a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: You can discard 1 Miracle dice. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if you discarded a Miracle dice: on a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

stratagems.name: PRAYER OF PRECISION
stratagems.type: Pious Protectors – Battle Tactic Stratagem
stratagems.legend: A whispered prayer prior to aiming steadies the hand and ensures each round strikes its mark.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your Shooting phase.TARGET: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.EFFECT: You can discard 1 Miracle dice. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. If you discarded a Miracle dice, you can re-roll the Hit roll instead.
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: You can discard 1 Miracle dice. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. If you discarded a Miracle dice, you can re-roll the Hit roll instead.

stratagems.name: REPEL BOARDERS
stratagems.type: Pious Protectors – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: Adepta Sororitas purgation teams excel at repelling boarding parties, repelling wave after wave of boarders with stoic defiance.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Movement or Charge phase.TARGET: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that has not fired Overwatch this phase.EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack while firing Overwatch, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ is required to score a hit, instead of an unmodified 6. In addition, until the end of the phase, each time you roll to determine the number of attacks made with a weapon equipped by a model in your unit, you can re-roll the result.

stratagems.name: RADIANT ILLUMINATION
stratagems.type: Pious Protectors – Strategic Ploy Stratagem
stratagems.legend: As the enemy hurl themselves forth, the Emperor's divine light shines upon his faithful, blinding the unbelievers with its radiant glare.
stratagems.fullDescription: WHEN: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit has declared a charge.TARGET: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army (excluding ARCO-FLAGELLANTS and REPENTIA SQUAD units) that was selected as a target of that charge.EFFECT: You can discard 1 Miracle dice. Until the end of the phase, subtract 1 from Charge rolls made for that enemy unit. If you discarded a Miracle dice, subtract 2 from Charge rolls made forthat enemy unit instead.
